wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Rees (8 May 1913 – 19 February 1991) was a Welsh international rugby union prop who played club rugby for Newport RFC. He was a member of the winning Welsh team who beat the 1935 touring All Blacks.

response: * Tom Rees (rugby union, born 1913) (1913–1991), Welsh international rugby union prop
* Tom Rees (rugby union, born 1984), rugby union footballer of the 2000 and 2010s for England, and London Wasps
* Tom Rees (RFC officer) (1895–1916), first man killed by the "Red Baron"
* Tom Rees, physician and co-founder of AMREF
